column1: * 1923 – J.R.R. Tolkien receives an increase in salary from £600 p.a. to £700 p.a.
* 1936 – Voice actor David Buck is born.
* 1952 – J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed supervisor of T.P. Dunnings thesis.
* 1964 – The second episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1966 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to a Primary School in Acocks Green in Acocks Green.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
